Q: How often should I update this?
Q: Snowball vs Avalanche - which should I use?
A: Snowball = quick wins (smallest first). Avalanche = saves money (highest rate first)
Q: How much should I have in emergency fund?
Q: How do I calculate my net worth?
A: Total Assets - Total Liabilities = Net Worth
